doc:
Marlene Clark https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marlene_Clark 0 Marlene Clark (born December 19, 1949) is an American retired actress and fashion model. Clark is perhaps best known for her portrayals of Ganja Meda in the 1973 horror film Ganja Hess and Janet Lawson, Lamont's (portrayed by Demond Wilson) girlfriend in the comedy sitcom Sanford and Son starring Redd Foxx from its fifth season in 1975 until the series conclusion in 1977. Marlene_Clark ( born December_19_,_1949 ) is an_American_retired_actress_and_fashion_model . Clark is_perhaps_best_known for her_portrayals of Ganja_Meda in the_1973_horror_film_Ganja_ and Janet_Lawson , Lamont 's_( portrayed by Demond_Wilson_)_girlfriend in the_comedy_sitcom_Sanford_and_Son starring Redd_Foxx from its_fifth_season in 1975 until the_series_conclusion in 1977 .
